title: "about tab" help

replies.body: It is easy to learn some basic html this website should help you. http://www.w3schools.com/html/

replies.body: do I put the code In the about tab

replies.body:
I have this for background "<body style="background-color:darkorange">"
It wont work plz help
replies.body_tagged:
I have this for background "<body style="background-color:darkorange">"
It wont work plz help

replies.body:
Avicus doesn't support "<body style>" for your profile.
You can use "div, span, br, img, a, b, i, pre, blockquote, center, code, hr, ul, ol, li, h1, h2, h3, h4, small" for editing your page.
replies.body_tagged:
Avicus doesn't support "<body style>" for your profile.
You can use "div, span, br, img, a, b, i, pre, blockquote, center, code, hr, ul, ol, li, h1, h2, h3, h4, small" for editing your page.
